charaepi_ch0290_00_teru/2301_1101_0100_2:
While [Name:PlayerNickname ] was out on a
walk, [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he" F="she" ] spotted Rei with some others.
charaepi_ch0290_00_teru/2301_1201_0800_1:
Professor Kukui wants to do some research on
Hisuian Decidueye’s moves!
charaepi_ch0290_00_teru/2301_1201_1100_1:
So that’s the kind of move a Decidueye raised in
Hisui’s harsh climate can use!
charaepi_ch0290_00_teru/2301_1201_1200_1: It’s like I took a hit from nature itself!
charaepi_ch0290_00_teru/2301_1201_1300_1:
Did that surprise you? This is how Professor Kukui
always does his research!
charaepi_ch0290_00_teru/2301_1201_1400_1:
Wow! Then I’m sure he’d have no trouble surviving
in Hisui with that kind of resilience!
charaepi_ch0290_00_teru/2301_1201_1500_1: Hey, what’s it like in Hisui?
charaepi_ch0290_00_teru/2301_1201_1600_1:
Hisui is rich in nature, but it's also a harsh
environment for people to live in.
charaepi_ch0290_00_teru/2301_1201_1700_1:
It might be hard for people in this age
to imagine...
charaepi_ch0290_00_teru/2301_1201_1800_1:
but it wasn’t always a widely accepted idea for
people and Pokémon to be partners.
charaepi_ch0290_00_teru/2301_1201_1900_1:
Back then, people used to get attacked by wild
Pokémon much more often...
charaepi_ch0290_00_teru/2301_1201_2000_1: It happened to me a lot during my surveys!
charaepi_ch0290_00_teru/2301_1201_2100_1:
But the Professor would do just fine in Hisui, since
he wants to get hit by Pokémon moves for
research!
charaepi_ch0290_00_teru/2301_1201_2200_1:
Guess so! You seem tough, Rei, but I’m pretty
solid, too!
charaepi_ch0290_00_teru/2301_1201_2300_1:
By the way... How’d you become friends with
that Decidueye?
charaepi_ch0290_00_teru/2301_1201_2400_1:
Decidueye is the first Pokémon I befriended
in Hisui.
charaepi_ch0290_00_teru/2301_1201_2500_1:
When I first arrived there, there was this person
I met...
charaepi_ch0290_00_teru/2301_1201_2600_1:
And while I was helping this person, I befriended
a Rowlet.
charaepi_ch0290_00_teru/2301_1201_2700_1: And your Rowlet evolved into this Decidueye!
charaepi_ch0290_00_teru/2301_1201_2900_1:
It’s interesting that they look the same as Dartrix,
but they can be so different as Decidueye.
charaepi_ch0290_00_teru/2301_1201_3000_1:
For sure! We gotta thank Rei and Decidueye for
teaching us this!
charaepi_ch0290_00_teru/2301_1201_3100_1:
Is there anything you wanna do while you’re on
Pasio, Rei?
charaepi_ch0290_00_teru/2301_1201_3200_1:
When I was in Hisui, I was able to help everyone
with my faint memories of being a Trainer.
charaepi_ch0290_00_teru/2301_1201_3300_1:
So together with Decidueye, I want to find things
here on Pasio that only we’re capable of doing.
charaepi_ch0290_00_teru/2301_1201_3400_1: Just like we did in Hisui!
charaepi_ch0290_00_teru/2301_1201_3500_1: After all, there must be a reason why I’m here!
charaepi_ch0290_00_teru/2301_0302_3800_1: I’m sure you’ll find that reason!
charaepi_ch0290_00_teru/2301_1201_4100_1:
We’re excited to see what you’ll find on
Pasio, Rei!
